page.title: 10More local phrases
page.content: { LOCAL PHRASE TRANSLATION} Si thi layta _See you later. Av teld thi _I have told you befowa before. Tharl ged a crack_You will get a smack. Cum agen _Say it again. Ar gorrit fost _I got it first. Tha bike darn _That bicycle down jitee is it yorn? the alley is it yours? Ode thi osses _Wait a while. Wots up wi im? _What is the matter with him? Put wood in ole _Shut the door. A bet tha dint _I bet you did not no that know that. A tha cummin ert?_Are you coming out? Haz tha bin? _Are you well? Innit ot _It is very warm. I ant bin ter see_I have not been to yer lately see you lately.
